title: The Cherry Orchard - Anton Chekhov  (1965 and 1974)
description:
Audio Books : Literary : Other quality : English

This torrent contains two English-language audio versions of Anton Chekhov's "The Cherry Orchard": the 1965 Caedmon recording and the 1974 BBC.

The 1965 Caedmon recording was transferred by me from a library copy of the original 3-LP set.



Cast:
For some reason Demonoid will not allow me to enter the cast!! I had terrible trouble getting it to accept my upload and now it won't accept certain text, such as the cast list! VERY BIZARRE!

Translated by Tyrone Guthrie and Leonid Kipnis.
Producer - Tyrone Guthrie
Recording Director - Marshall Jameson


Also included in the torrent folder is the 1974 BBC Radio 3 production which I found on the internet.

Cast:

Madame Ranyevskaya - Gwen Ffrangcon-Davies
Anya, her daughter - Sinead Cusack
Varya,her adopted daughter - Anna Massey
Gaev, her brother - Robert Harris
Lopachin, a businessman - Kenneth Haigh
Trofimov, a student - Terry Scully
Simeonov-Pishchik, a land-owner - Timothy Bateson
Charlotta, a governess - Patricia Routledge
Yepixodov, a clerk - Andrew Sachs
Doonyasha, a maid - Elizabeth Revill
Firs, an old manservant - Rolf Lefebvre
Yasha, a young man servant - Hugh Ross

Translated by Richard Cottrell
Director - John Tydeman

Last, I included the InteliQuest discussion about the play (part of the series World's 100 Greatest Books of All Time), also found on the internet.



Enjoy and Seed!!
